Headline: #47 47th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 47th/Hoyne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Western, 51st, Ashland and 47th, over normal route, due to street blockage near 47th/Hoyne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/85th
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 87th, Burley, 83rd and South Shore : due to, street blockage near Commercial/85th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 87th, Burley, 83rd, South Shore and over regular route: due to, street blockage near Commercial/85th.

Allow extra travel time.
